title: Anger Management
excerpt: Helping individuals understand, manage and cope with deep, anger related challenges.
body: By providing you with customized support and a professional setting that is safe and judge-free, Second Wind Rehabilitation Services aims to encourage and empower you to manage and cope with deep, anger related challenges. This support is facilitated through a combination of counseling services that assist you in understanding the root of your anger challenges so you can gain skills and apply techniques that balance your emotions and improve your relationships.

title: Prescription Drugs
excerpt: Offering doctor-prescribed medication for individualized health or medical conditions.
body: Keeping your health and overall wellness as the top priority at Second Wind Rehabilitation Services will always serve as our mission. Medication is prescribed on a case-by-case basis, taking individual medical conditions, ailments and other needs into consideration. All medications are prescribed by a qualified doctor who also provides you with the necessary guidance for consumption.

title: Relapse Prevention
excerpt: Encouraging proactive strategies and coping mechanisms that prevent setbacks.
body: By providing you with the proper strategies, resources and support you need, Second Wind Rehabilitation Services aims to assist you in maintaining your sobriety and avoiding setbacks. Relapse prevention is facilitated through counseling services that provide understanding of individual triggers and negative coping mechanisms. After identifying past, current and potential stressors, our staff members are able to empower, educate and encourage you to develop a healthier lifestyle, proactive strategies and healthier coping mechanisms.

title: Group Counseling
excerpt: Professional counseling services designed to encourage healing in a safe, community style environment.
body: Providing you with a professional environment to gain self-awareness, share perspectives, explore similar experiences and overcome obstacles amongst peers allows Second Wind Rehabilitation Services to facilitate group counseling in a safe, non-judgemental and confidential space. Group counseling offers a combination of coummunity, therapy based exercises, resources and feedback that encourages growth, healing and reflection.

title: One on One Counseling
excerpt: Professional counseling services designed to encourage healing in a safe, individualized environment.
body: Giving you a safe and confidential space to share your experiences, understand your challenges and develop coping strategies allows Second Wind Rehabilitation Services to provide treatment plans specific to your needs. One on One Counseling is designed to encourage you to explore your emotions and empower you to address challenges head on in order to achieve an overall healthier lifestyle.

title: Virtual Therapy
excerpt: Professional counseling services designed to encourage healing in a safe, virtual environment.
body: Ensuring that you have access to therapy services from the comfort of your home or a quiet location where you feel comfortable gives Second Wind Rehabilitation Services the ability to serve you without physical health or location constraints. Virtual therapy provides you with all of the same benefits as One on One Counseling with the goal of helping you achieve an overall healthier lifestyle.

title: Job Training & Life Skills
excerpt: Providing support and resources for practical job readiness, professional skill development and essential skills that encourage independence and adaptability.
body: Setting you up for success with practical job readiness, professional skill development and essential skills that encourage independence and adaptability. At Second Wind Rehabilitation Services, Job Training & Life Skills support provides you with the resources, encouragement and tools you need to transition into complete independence, a successful work-life as well as healthier and more fulfilling relationships.

title: Temporary Housing Assistance
excerpt: Providing short-term, safe, and sanitary housing assistance while you are in our care.
body: Meditex Clinics Department of Dental Specialties in Minnesota provides coordinated care for adults and children who require specialized dental care. Depending on the persons needs, care may include one specialty or more than one (multispecialty care, also called multidisciplinary care).
An attractive, healthy smile is an important part of life. Our General Dentistry Department provides a broad range of services to meet your family’s dental needs including:

• Oral Exam/Radiograph Study (mandatory at initial visit)
  • Periodontal Scaling/Deep Cleaning
  • Dental care for pregnant patients consists on evaluation and cleaning; mainly,to educate patients on oral health care and pregnancy
  • Restorative Dentistry – Amalgam/Composite Fillings
